flawed_nl_solution:
The pistachios cost 10/5=${<<10/5=2>>}2 per ounce
He eats 30/5=<<30/5=6>>6 ounces of pistachios a day
So he spends 6*2=${<<6*2=12>>}12 per day on pistachios
So he spends 12*7=${<<12*7=48>>}48 per week

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 84.0, not 48.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
